column1: Elder Carn, from the Orthodox synagogue.
Their cash flows out of them like diarrhea from the buffalo.
Well your way of life is about to change, little boys. Now move!
Yes, and Eagle says the cumulative shared market loss on the revenue of the new casino drops fifteen percent every day.
But they are determined and proud. And the spirit of the wind has stated that if we use force, it could be a publicity nightmare, further hurting our net assets.
SARS has spread through the entire town of South Park, Chief Runs with Premise. Their wills will break soon.

It is amazing. All our plants and herbs failed to heal him, but your people's remedy brings the spirit of the buffalo back into his heart. Perhaps there are many things we can learn from your way of life.
